resources.string:
This is a live wallpaper app which allows you to choose video as wallpaper.

Touch thumbnail on card list to choose a video.

Needs GLESv3 support for video cutting.

Some icon are gotten from https://www.flaticon.com/, thanks to author Freepik for app icon, Hanan for add icon on button and Daniel Bruce for check icon on button.
Cannot add wallpaper with empty name or path
Loading default wallpaper failed! Please set manually.

If you want to add videos on you device as wallpapers, you must grant READ_STORAGE permission to this app.\nIt promises that only read video by using system video picker which returns a uri instead of real path, so you won\'t worry about privacy leak.
Failed to get read storage permission and unable to add video wallpapers
If allowed sliding, it\'s possible to see blackbars and offset while previewing, and they won\'t show at homepage.
